Traits.Name: Ethereal Drift
Traits.Content: The Nightcrawler can move through difficult terrain without hindrance and leaves no tracks behind.

Traits.Name: Aura of Awe
Traits.Content: Creatures within 30 ft. of the Nightcrawler must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the Nightcrawler leaves their vicinity.

Traits.Name: Harmless Presence
Traits.Content: Animals and children remain calm and are unaffected by the Nightcrawler's presence.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Nightcrawler makes two attacks: one with Leg Sweep and one with Eerie Touch.

Actions.Name: Leg Sweep
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, Action dealing 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target fails a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, they are knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Eerie Touch
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, Action dealing 4 (1d6 + 1) necrotic damage. If the target is hit, they must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take an extra 2 (1d4) necrotic damage at the start of their next turn.
